about.summary: GNU parallel is a shell tool for executing jobs in parallel using one or more computers.

name: parallel
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "20200322" %}
{% set sha256 = "207484e124860e215cc3e4d7aff48b3b1c4376c95b3c7c7888453c67e92be94d" %}

package:
  name: parallel
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: http://ftpmirror.gnu.org/parallel/parallel-{{ version }}.tar.bz2
  fn: parallel-{{ version }}.tar.bz2
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - make
  run:
    - perl

test:
  commands:
    - parallel --version  # [not win]
    - bash -c 'parallel --version'  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.gnu.org/software/parallel/
  license: GPL-3
  license_family: GPL
  summary: GNU parallel is a shell tool for executing jobs in parallel using one or more computers.
  license_file: COPYING

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rvalieris
